sect2.title: 内容
sect2.para: Procmail 包括 procmail, formail, lockfile 和 mailstat.

sect3.title: procmail
sect3.para: procmail is an autonomous mail processor. It performs all the functions of a MDA (Mail Delivery Agent).

sect3.title: formail
sect3.para: formail is a filter that can be used to format mail into mailbox format.

sect3.title: lockfile
sect3.para: lockfile is a utility that can lock a file for single use interactively 或 in a script.

sect3.title: mailstat
sect3.para: mailstat prints a summary report of mail that has been filtered by procmail since the last time mailstat was ran.
